history.proof: intro H. qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rabs_le. - srun best use: Rmin_l. - srun best use: Rmax_l.

exceptions.tactic: apply StepFun_bound in psi as [s Hs].

exceptions.exn: The reference s was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hs was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: apply Rle_trans with (r2 := Rabs (f x - phi x)); auto.
exceptions.exn: The reference x was not found in the current environment.

original: intro H. destruct H as [phi [psi [Hphi Hpsi]]]. apply StepFun_bound in psi as [s Hs]. exists s. intros x Hx. apply Hphi in Hx. specialize (Hs x Hx). apply Rabs_le in Hx. apply Rle_trans with (r2 := Rabs (f x - phi x)); auto.
